text: Marcel Perrot (24 February 1879 - 16 July 1969) was a French fencer. He won a silver medal in the team foil event at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1969 deaths Category:People from Vendôme Category:French male fencers Category:French foil fencers Category:Olympic fencers of France Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in fencing Category:Medalists at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Loir-et-Cher
title: Marcel Perrot
